thread.title: De La Rue profit hit as drops blue British passport bid

title: De La Rue profit hit as drops blue British passport bid
text:
De La Rue profit hit as drops blue British passport bid 11:02am EDT - 01:21 
De La Rue has abandoned its challenge to Britain's decision to award the contract for new blue post-Brexit passports to a foreign firm and issued a profit warning, sending its shares to a year low. David Pollard reports.   
De La Rue has abandoned its challenge to Britain's decision to award the contract for new blue post-Brexit passports to a foreign firm and issued a profit warning, sending its shares to a year low. David Pollard reports.  //reut.rs/2qJZglZ
